preqs: This unit is only available to students enrolled in the Bachelor of Arts, Bachelor of Journalism and associated double degrees.Bachelor of Arts students must have completed a major in Journalism and have a course WAM equal to or greater than 70.Bachelor of Journalism students must have passed ATS1328, ATS1329, ATS1901, ATS1902; plus 12 credit points of Journalism and Journalism studies units at second year level which should include ATS2784 and ATS2785 and have course WAM equal to or greater than 70.

rules.ruleString: Must have course WAM equal to or greater than 70
Must have course WAM equal to or greater than 65

For COURSE_CODE IN {0002, 0080, 0556, 1541, 4098} Do (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1089, ATS1090, ATS1328, ATS1329} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2784, ATS2787, ATS2790} AND  Must have passed 12 (I/W) credit points at levels {3} in discipline {100703}) Otherwise For COURSE_CODE IN {A2000, A2004, A2005, A20051, B2012, B2019, B2020, B2024, C2002, D3002, E3002, L3003, S2006} Do (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1089, ATS1090} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2784, ATS2787} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3265, ATS3645} AND  Must have passed 48 (I/W) credit points at levels {1, 2, 3} in discipline {100703} AND  Must have passed 18 (I/W) credit points at levels {3} in discipline {100703}) Otherwise For COURSE_CODE IN {4042, 4069, 4425, 4426} Do (Must have passed 4 (I/W) units in {ATS1089, ATS1090, ATS1328, ATS1329, ATS1901, ATS1902} AND  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2784, ATS2785}) Otherwise true

For COURSE_CODE IN {0002, 0080, 0556, 1541, 4098} Do (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1089, ATS1090, ATS1328, ATS1329} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2784, ATS2787, ATS2790} AND  Must have passed 12 (I/W) credit points at levels {3} in discipline {100703}) Otherwise For COURSE_CODE IN {A2000, A2004, A2005, A20051, B2012, B2019, B2020, B2024, C2002, D3002, E3002, L3003, S2006} Do (Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS1089, ATS1090} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2784, ATS2787} AND  Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS3265, ATS3645} AND  Must have passed 48 (I/W) credit points at levels {1, 2, 3} in discipline {100703} AND  Must have passed 18 (I/W) credit points at levels {3} in discipline {100703}) Otherwise For COURSE_CODE IN {4042, 4069, 4425, 4426} Do (Must have passed 4 (I/W) units in {ATS1089, ATS1090, ATS1328, ATS1329, ATS1901, ATS1902} AND  Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {ATS2784, ATS2785}) Otherwise true

description: This is a final year unit. Students have the option of undertaking an industry placement in print, audio, visual or on-line media. Placement opportunities are negotiated with the Unit Coordinator, and require students to produce self-authored work for publication/broadcast and to produce a reflective report on the process and products of the placement.
